title: What are the rules and techniques of magnetism for healing various diseases?
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses the various ways in which magnetic energy can be used to treat certain illnesses. They detail how different parts of the body correspond to different senses, and which fingers should be used in treatment based on which sense is affected. The author also explains how to recognize concentration points in the body and offers guidance on how to use passes with the affected organ. Finally, the author includes guidelines for duration and frequency of treatment, as well as tips for recognizing whether the cause of the illness is material or spiritual.

last_phrase: In conclusion, practicing magnetism involves using specific passes to alleviate pain and balance the magnetic force within a patient's body. The rule of thumb is to always avoid touching the affected area and to make passes from the closest to furthest nerve knots.
